caption:
Table 2: Detection comparison on YCB.
Our method consistently outperforms other methods, especially in terms of AP75.
references:
Comparison with the state of the art on YCB.
We compare our method with the state-of-the-art detection methods, including AutoAssign [51] and PAA  [22], on the YCB dataset. Table 2 summarizes the results, showing that our method consistently outperforms the state-of-the-art ones, especially in terms of AP75.
